name: SLComposable
summary: SLComposable provides a simpler API for creating and presenting SLComposeViewControllers.
description: TODO: To make use of SLComposable, simply call `composePost(text text: String?, image: UIImage?, url: NSURL?, network: SLComposableServiceType)` from any UIViewController. This will create, populate and present an SLComposeViewController.
